title: Fullstack Developer
description: Developed bilingual website for Japanese manpower company, including custom content management system for seamless updates in Japanese and English.

Created mentor-mentee web application as backend developer using Django and Python, gaining experience in Docker, CI/CD pipelines with Jenkins, and real-time messaging with asynchronous programming and Socket.IO.
Enhanced skills and knowledge base through diverse projects, fueling passion for innovative solutions meeting diverse client needs.

title: Back End Developer
description: Spearheaded development of robust system optimizing data tracking and staff scheduling for dental nurses and practices.
Engineered dedicated subsystem for dental nurses to post availability and record working hours, enhancing productivity.
Designed user-friendly interface for dental practices to request staff resources, fostering transparency and trust in staffing process.
Demonstrated blend of technical expertise and strong communication skills to bridge gap between user requirements and system functionality.

title: Web Developer
description: Collaborated within cross-functional team to enhance existing systems, ensuring optimal performance and client satisfaction.
Led development of comprehensive donation application facilitating users to create campaigns and make contributions seamlessly.
Engaged directly with clients to understand needs and translate them into actionable system improvements, fostering strong client relationships.
Demonstrated commitment to excellence in system optimization and client satisfaction through impactful contributions despite brief tenure.
